name: Corrupt Casino
description:
So uhm, hi,  my name is Felipe and I made this game with my brother Lucas, we did our best to make this the best first Jam of ours but we didn't managed to put all the features we wanted such as: Enemy Spawners, a Better Arena, and much worse the theme of the Jam wasn't able to make the cut fully: picking chips from the health bar and using it to Roll the Dice so we would either get a upgrade on our weapon, or we wouldn't gain nothing and loose the chips we bet, this as well of many animations for the player and the enemy characters.

But we had a blast nonetheless, we learned a lot and sharpened our skills in never thought before ways, we hope you enjoy our little game made in 2 days, and eyes forward for the next year's Jam.

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot Cards

Art and Coding done by Lucas (@LeoBolota_)

SFX and Management done by me, Felipe (@CharlieNot_)
